snippet.title: Gift from the Gods Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the ZX Spectrum game, Gift from the Gods. A 1984 game from Ocean...Our Hero, Orestes, aided by the Gods returns to Mycenea, to regain his Kingdom from the clutches of his treacherous stepfather and evil mother. Orestes must fulfil his destiny by trial in the Labyrinth beneath the palace and find the solution to the puzzle, or perish in the attempt.

This replaces the low resolution video uploaded back in 2012.

From the recording originally sent by Miguel Garcia to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ . 


#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
